name: ConversAI
description: AI video generation pipeline that automatically creates multilingual video content with popular characters using F5-TTS. Deployed on AWS with an auto-scaling workflow using SQS and Lambda because, well, GPUs are expensive ;_;

name: BITS Payment Interface (BPI)
description: High-concurrency, secure payments platform built for BITS Pilani Goa Campus. Handled ~â‚¹6M in peak transactions over 3 days with encrypted token-based sessions, robust logging and monitoring for troubleshooting under load.

name: Semantic Code Search Engine
description: Rust-powered code search engine that uses semantic dataflows to find errors and navigate massive projects. Think of it as Ctrl+F but on steroids. Extended ideas presented in an existing ACM research paper for error detection.
